mapper.select: select id, name, code, parent_id from auth_permission where id in (select rp.permission_id from auth_user_role ur left join auth_role r on r.id = ur.role_id left join auth_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{param.id} and r.deleted = #{param.deleted} and r.status = #{param.status});
